title: Rotkohl (German red cabbage)
ingredients: ['900g red cabbage, shredded', '2 medium onions, thinly sliced', '2 cooking apples - peeled, cored and chopped finely', '3 tablespoons caster sugar', '6 whole cloves', '4 tablespoons dry cider', '1 tablespoon salted butter', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
